name: The Neville Prophecy: Pilgrimage of Fate
name_original: The Neville Prophecy: Pilgrimage of Fate
description:
Survive 6 stages in this fast-paced arcade bullet hell game!

You are Base, a mage who is tasked with defeating the evil cultist Diablerie. You must travel through the enemy's territory and save the world.

Featuring:

 - Addicting bullet-hell gameplay

 - Three unique boss fights

 - A stage selector for practicing

 - A banger soundtrack by Jackachulian

 - And includes a free mini-lore book!

Credits:
  • Game: infinityJKA
    • Game uses some modified code from this tutorial.
  • Soundtrack: Jackachulian

Note: This game is part of the Lemniscate multiverse, but does not require any prior knowledge to be fully enjoyed.

(Lemniscate wiki)
